statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 5 , 27 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} - 21 \, x + 48 , 6 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} + 13 , -3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + x - 6 , -6 \, x^{3} + 10 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
